articles.title: Trial of American Journalists to Begin
articles.content:
Trial of American Journalists to Begin
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Court of the DPRK will start a trial of American journalists Laura Ling and Seung-eun Lee from 3 p.m. Thursday on the basis of the indictment already brought against them.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kuwaiti Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kuwaiti Prime Minister
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Kim Yong Il Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Sheikh Nasser Al-Muhammad Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah upon his staying in office as Prime Minister of Kuwait.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the two peoples, the message wished him always success in his work to ensure the social stability and the economic development of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kuwaiti FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kuwaiti FM
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Sabah Al Salem Al Sabah on his stay in office as deputy Prime Minister and foreign minister.
					 The message expressed wish that he would always enjoy a healthy and happy life and achieve success in his work.

articles.title: Staff Members of Syrian Embassy Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Staff Members of Syrian Embassy Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Salah Soukkar, charge d' affaires ad interim, and staff member of the Syrian embassy here gave helping hands to the DPRK-Syria Friendship Wonhwa Co-op Farm, Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, on Thursday. 
					The guests visited the Wonhwa Revolutionary Museum and went round the monument to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and buildings and fields associated with revolutionary activities of the President.
					
					 Then they helped farmers in weeding a bean field.
					
					  They enjoyed an art performance given by farmers.
					
					 Salah Soukkar said that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by Hafez Al-Assad and Kim Il Sung, the eternal leaders of the two countries, are growing stronger under the deep care of President Bashar Al-Assad and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					  Reiterating his will to make positive efforts to boost the bilateral friendly ties, he wished the farm greater success in the agricultural production.
					
					 He handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for the Pochonbo Torch Prize opened with due ceremony in Wonsan, Kangwon Province Wednesday on the occasion of the anniversary of the victory in the Pochonbo battle commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Its participants will compete in at least 20 events including football, basketball, volleyball, marathon, shooting, boxing and weightlifting which will take place in Pyongyang, Wonsan, Nampho and other places.

articles.title: Undying Torch of Pochonbo
articles.content:
Undying Torch of Pochonbo
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Today is the 72nd anniversary of the victorious Battle of Pochonbo. On this occasion the Korean people are looking back, with deep emotion, upon the historic day when President   Kim Il Sung fired a shot of victory to the night sky over Pochonbo in the darkest period of the Japanese imperialist rule, thus declaring that Korea was not dead but alive.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
					The Japanese imperialists who had illegally occupied Korea got more frantic in their fascist oppression of the Korean people entering the middle of the 1930s.
					
					Clamoring that the "Japanese and Koreans are of the same descent" and "Korea and Japan are one", the Japanese imperialists pursued more viciously than ever before the policy of obliterating the Korean nation whereby to deprive them of their spoken and written language and their family names.
					
					When the destiny of the Korean nation stood at the crossroads of life and death, the President worked out a plan to storm a lair of the Japanese imperialists with arms of the revolution and thus inspire the Koreans with confidence in and hope for the national liberation and arouse them to the anti-Japanese resistance.
					
					He acquainted himself down to the details with the reality of the motherland from underground workers dispatched to the homeland while seeing to it that full preparations were made for the advance into the homeland with a large unit.
					
					At 10 p.m. on June 4, Juche 26 (1937) a gunshot fired by the President reverberated far and wide to the nocturnal sky over Pochonbo.
					
					Members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army surprised the police substation of the Japanese imperialists and enemy's administrative centers such as forest conservation office, sub-county office, post office and fire hall were engulfed in flames in an instant. And appeals and handbills were scattered in the street.
					
					Tong-A Ilbo and other major newspapers in the homeland strived to be the first for reporting the news of the battle and Ryo Un Hyong and other figures hurried to Pochonbo to see the battle site with their own eyes -- all the country seethed with the news of the battle.
					
					The Battle of Pochonbo was followed by the victorious battles of Mt. Kouyushui and Jiansanfeng to add great confidence and courage to the people.
					
					The historic Battle of Pochonbo convinced the Korean people that not only Korea was still alive but also they were fully capable of achieving national liberation, when they fought against Japanese imperialism with arms in their hands. It dealt a severe irretrievable political and military blow to the Japanese aggressors who boasted of their "invincibility".

articles.title: Chonghyoldan, Health Food
articles.content:
Chonghyoldan, Health Food
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Microbiology under the State Academy of Sciences has made Chonghyoldan, a blood purifying capsule.
					 It is a health food made from rare medicinal mushroom which has widely been used in the treatment of hypertension and arteriosclerosis of senescent persons from ancient time.
					
					 The capsule contains essential amino acids and vitamins B, PP and C, especially a large amount of vitamin B6 efficacious for the prevention of arteriosclerosis and thrombus.
					
					 It also contains calcium, magnesium and other minerals. Its potassium content is 30 times that of pumpkin.
					
					 Its application to several hundred patients of hypertension, cerebro-arterial sclerosis, thrombosis and transient ischemic attack (TIA) for a month in recent years (two capsules in each dose two or three times a day) resulted in the removal of headache, dizziness, memory disorder, speech disorder and quadriplegia. The rate of cure was around 90 percent.

articles.title: Graphite Products Well Received
articles.content:
Graphite Products Well Received
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A commutator brush for rotary electric machines made with natural graphite abundant in the country has been developed in the DPRK to be widely used.
					 It is a precious achievement conducive to putting fresh muscles into the Juche character and independence of graphite industry.
					
					 The World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) and the European Patent Office recognized the brush developed in the DPRK to be a new scientific and technical achievement and registered it as an European patent.
					
					 The International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) adopted the standard of the brush as the commission's standard of common use "IEC/PAS 62072".
					
					 The natural graphite brush is 1.5 times the artificial graphite brush made in other countries in resistance to bending and 1.4 times in hardness and its resistivity is a quarter and volumetric weight one-fifth of the latter. Yet there is no change in physical and mechanical quality in operation.
					
					 It is about two-thirds of the artificial one in production processes and yet gives no effect on ecological environment.
					
					 It can be used not only as a brush for the large-size thermal power generator but also one for the traction electromotor of heavy power and for the gas turbogenerator with a rotational speed 9,000r/min. It is drawing international attention for causing no environmental pollution in production and usage.

articles.title: Independence, Basis for Strengthening Internationalism
articles.content:
Independence, Basis for Strengthening Internationalism
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Political independence is linked with internationalism and is the basis for strengthening it.
					 Political independence is manifested in exercising full-fledged sovereignty and equality in external relations.
					
					 There are in the world parties and countries, big and small, and economically developed and underdeveloped nations. But, they are all equal and independent. Therefore, one should not infringe on other's sovereignty and one's sovereignty should not be disturbed by others.
					
					 Political independence is linked with internationalism and there can not be internationalism apart from independence.
					
					 Internationalism is not an abstract concept divorced from the revolution of each country but closely related with it.
					
					 Only when one makes revolution successfully in one's country, can one fully support other's revolution with experience and substantial strength and fulfill the international duty.
					
					 Political independence is also the basis for consolidating internationalism.
					
					 Internationalist unity should be voluntary and equal by nature. For this purpose, political independence should be fully ensured between countries.
					
					 There can be neither friendship nor solidarity among the nations when someone orders other countries to act this or that way, threatening their sovereignty without respecting it or meddling in their internal affairs.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK have exercised full-fledged political sovereignty and equality and successfully combined  political independence with internationalism in the external relations by uniting with the socialist countries, non-aligned countries and other developing countries and strengthening solidarity with the countries which are friendly with them on the principle of territorial integrity, respect of sovereignty, nonaggression, noninterference in each other's internal affairs, equality and mutual benefits.
					
					 As seen above, independence in politics is linked with true patriotism and genuine internationalism, not "nationalism" or "isolationism".

articles.title: U.S. Talk about Human Rights of Other Countries Snubbed
articles.content:
U.S. Talk about Human Rights of Other Countries Snubbed
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- It is impertinent for the U.S. to deliberately cite "human rights situation" of various countries of the world for wantonly interfering in their internal affairs and this is a revelation of extreme arrogance. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 No one granted the U.S. the right to interfere in the internal affairs of other countries under the pretext of human rights issues.
					
					 As far as the human rights standard is concerned, there can be no uniform human rights standard suited to all countries of the world and such standard can never exist. It is quite natural that human rights standard may vary from one country to another country and from one people to another people as they are different from one another in ideology, ism, religion and system and the level of economic and cultural development and goals of their struggle.
					
					 A human rights standard can be regarded as a fair one when it is liked by the people and it is in line with their interests.
					
					 It is a brigandish act for the U.S. to comment on "the human rights records" in other countries as it pleases by applying its own "human rights standard" based on its view on value and take issue with them and interfere in their internal affairs. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove the human rights abuses perpetrated by the U.S. in Iraq, the article says:
					
					 The U.S. has the worst human rights record in the world.
					
					 Its trumpeting about "protection of human rights" is nothing but a crafty artifice to justify and shield its acts of aggression, high-handed practices, infringement upon others' sovereignty.
					
					 Those countries that refuse to meekly obey the U.S. and maintain an anti-U.S. stance are made without exception targets of the U.S. "human rights" offensive.
					
					 The U.S. efforts to realize its wild ambition for dominating the world under the signboard of "protection of human rights" would get it nowhere.
					
					 The U.S. had better mind its own business before talking about other countries' "human rights issues."

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Reckless Remarks Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Reckless Remarks Blasted
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Puppet Prime Minister of south Korea Han Sung Su, when meeting Japanese Prime Minister Aso recently, vociferated about "building of future-oriented and matured partnership" and "close cooperation in handling the north's missile and nuclear issues and so forth".
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 These outbursts are nothing but a hideous act of treachery as they are aimed at covering up the crimes of Japan and encouraging it in its moves for reinvasion of Korea and a revelation of a sinister intention to realize the ambition for confrontation with fellow countrymen at any cost in conspiracy with outside forces. 
					
					 The group of traitors took sides with the Japanese reactionaries, talking about "cooperation" with them at a time when the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries are getting evermore undisguised in their moves to stifle the DPRK under the pretext of its nuclear activities for self-defense. This goes to clearly prove that their scenario to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and do harm to it by relying on outside forces has reached an extremely reckless phase. 
					
					 The Lee group is the group of wicked traitors which is so unashamed as to kiss the sworn enemy of the nation for the purpose of achieving its objective of confrontation and realizing its ambition to ignite a war against the north. 
					
					 It is a sheer daydream for the Lee group to bring down the DPRK through cooperation with outside forces. This attempt of the group will only invite bitter curses of the fellow countrymen and precipitate their stern judgment and its self-destruction. 
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to bear this in mind and stop such sycophancy and treachery as colluding with outside forces in betrayal of the nation.

articles.title: Colombian Pyongyang Cultural Exchange Centre Inaugurated
articles.content:
Colombian Pyongyang Cultural Exchange Centre Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Colombian Pyongyang Cultural Exchange Centre was inaugurated with due ceremony on May 19 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the start of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The chairman of the centre was elected at the ceremony.
					
					 He said that the centre would briskly conduct colorful activities in different areas of Colombia to widely introduce the proud successes the Korean people are achieving in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Discussed there were the problems for activating the centre and its detailed action program.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test Hailed by British Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test Hailed by British Organization
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain made public a statement on May 28 in support of the successful nuclear test conducted by the DPRK.
					 Noting that it is a sovereign right of the DPRK to conduct a nuclear test and, therefore, there is no reason for anyone to interfere in it, the statement said: It is the U.S. that was the first to test a nuclear weapon in the world and has the world's biggest stockpile of nukes. The U.S. accusation against the DPRK over its nuclear test only reveals the U.S. double standards. 
					
					 Recalling that the five permanent members of the UNSC that chided the DPRK's nuclear test are the biggest nuclear weapons states and some countries, too, are pushing ahead with their clandestine nuclear programs, the statement went on:
					
					 The DPRK has stood for several decades in confrontation with the U.S. imperialists which have threatened it with nuclear weapons.
					
					 It has not sat idle, just waiting for the U.S. imperialists to destroy it, but has bolstered up its reliable nuclear deterrent while developing the Juche-oriented nuclear power industry.
					
					 The recent nuclear test constituted a great victory of the DPRK as it helped further augment its national defence capability. 
					
					 We vehemently denounce the U.S. and its followers for kicking up all sorts of rows over the DPRK's nuclear test and call upon the world progressive people to fully support the Korean people in their just cause.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Meeting with Seyed Ali Khamenei Observed in Iran
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Meeting with Seyed Ali Khamenei Observed in Iran
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting, a photo exhibition and a film show were held at the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm on May 31 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's meeting with Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran.
					 Displayed in the venue of the function were photos of Kim Il Sung meeting with Khamenei and other photos introducing the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and the shining successes achieved by the Korean people in socialist construction.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Iran and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					  The manager of the farm said that the Iranian people always remember the immortal exploits performed by the President for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Iranian people highly praise the Korean people for having adhered to the principled stand in face of pressure and arbitrary practices of such hostile forces as the U.S. under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he said, adding that the Iranian people remain firm in their stand of supporting the just cause of the Korean people. 
					
					 The participants enjoyed sports and amusement games after watching the Korean film "Faith of Korea."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de las concursantes del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de las concursantes del EPC
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC la funcion de los grupos artisticos de las esposas de oficiales de las Unidades No.264 y No.604 del EPC quienes participan en el segundo concurso del segundo periodo de los grupos de ese tipo.
					  En el repertorio de la ocasion estuvieron varias piezas de diferentes generos como el coro "El pueblo canta de la fiesta de abril", el drama corto "Mas alla de las nubes", la poesia y narracion "Viviremos con el espiritu del Paektu".
					
					  Las ejecutantes describieron con mucho orgullo la felicidad infinita de si mismas que luchan formandose como fidedignas revolucionarias en el regazo del PTC y exteriorizaron su ferrea conviccion y voluntad de defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y la linea avanzada del frente de la patria uniendose con sus esposos levantados en la sagrada batalla por salvaguardar la patria.
					
					  El Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que ellas ofrecieron esa magnifica funcion componiendola con las obras de gran valor educativo y elogio mucho sus exitos logrados en la ocasion.
					
					  Destaco que las esposas de los militares, quienes vienen superando al frente y gustosamente todas las pruebas, son revolucionarias orgullosas que luchan dedicando todo lo suyo para hacer brillar nuestro regimen socialista, precioso patrimonio legado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, y prosiguio que el elevado mundo espiritual y el modo de lucha y vida de ellas sirven de ejemplo de la epoca.
					
					  Senalando que la propaganda artistica es muy importante para educar a los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores, presento las tareas programaticas para desarrollar el arte masivo.
					
					  Le acompanaron el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Won Hong y Hyon Chol Hae, el coronel general del EPC Han Tong Gun y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: ATCC anuncia el inicio del juicio sobre periodistas norteamericanas
articles.content:
ATCC anuncia el inicio del juicio sobre periodistas norteamericanas
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- El Tribunal Central de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea abrira a las 3 de la tarde del 4 de junio el proceso sobre las periodistas norteamericanas Laura Ling y Seung-eun Lee segun la ya formulada acusacion de sus crimenes
					
					.

articles.title: Inaugurado el torneo por Copa Antorcha de Pochombo
articles.content:
Inaugurado el torneo por Copa Antorcha de Pochombo
 Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon el acto inaugural del Torneo Deportivo por la Copa Antorcha de Pochombo.
					 Este evento se desarrolla anualmente en homenaje al dia de la victoria en la batalla de Pochombo organizada y comandada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Durante esa cita deportiva, se entablaran en Pyongyang, Wonsan, Nampho y otros lugares las competencias de mas de 20 disciplinas como futbol, baloncesto, voleibol, maraton, tiro, boxeo y levantamiento de pesas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza intervencion de EE.UU. en el tema de DDHH
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza intervencion de EE.UU. en el tema de DDHH
 Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos interviene en los asuntos internos de otros paises del mundo evaluando a sus caprichos la "situacion de derechos humanos" de ellos.
					 Esta accion tan atrevida parte de la extremada arrogancia del imperio porque nadie le ha dado el derecho a intervenir en los asuntos internos pretextando el problema de DDHH.
					
					  Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado hoy y continua:
					
					 Puesto que todos los paises del mundo se difieren entre si en cuanto a la idea, ideal, religion, sistema social, nivel de desarrollo economico y cultural y meta de lucha, los pueblos utilizan diferentes pautas en el asunto de derechos humanos.
					
					 Por esta razon, no hay ni puede haber una pauta unica aplicable por igual en todos los paises del planeta.
					
					  Sera la pauta imparcial la que les guste a las masas populares y convenga a sus intereses.
					
					  EE.UU. evalua arbitrariamente y cuestiona la "situacion de DDHH" de otros paises con la "norma" al estilo norteamericano basada en su concepcion de valor e interviene en los asuntos internos de los segundos actuando como gangster.
					
					 Paradojicamente, los casos de violacion de DDHH en Iraq por parte de los efectivos norteamericanos muestran que EE.UU. se halla en la peor situacion de DDHH en el ambito mundial.
					
					 La "defensa de DDHH" pregonada por el imperio no pasa de ser una taimada artimana para justificar la agresion, el despotismo y el atentado a la soberania de otros paises.
					
					 En particular, los paises inobedientes al imperio y de la posicion antiyanqui son blancos, sin excepcion alguna, de la ofensiva norteamericana en el campo de DDHH.
					
					 Seria conveniente a EE.UU. que deje su ambicion de dominar el mundo bajo la pretendida consigna de "defensa de DDHH" y se limpie primero su nariz antes de cuestionar a otros paises.
